summary: This code uses the am start command to launch the ShortcutActivity in AutoJS, passing the path of a JavaScript file ("/storage/emulated/0/脚本/show_toast.js") as an argument. This could be used for executing a specific AutoJS script on the device.

details.comment: This code uses the am start command to launch the ShortcutActivity in AutoJS, passing the path of a JavaScript file ("/storage/emulated/0/脚本/show_toast.js") as an argument. This could be used for executing a specific AutoJS script on the device.
details.content:
am start -n org.autojs.autoxjs.v6/org.autojs.autojs.external.shortcut.ShortcutActivity -a android.intent.action.MAIN -e path "/storage/emulated/0/脚本/show_toast.js"
#am start -n org.autojs.autoxjs.v6/org.autojs.autojs.external.shortcut.ShortcutActivity -a android.intent.action.MAIN -e path "/storage/emulated/0/脚本/qq_share_auto.js"
